mapper.select: SELECT ch.*, c.name as cd_name, c.sequence as sequence FROM child_health ch JOIN child c ON ch.cd_no = c.no WHERE ch.u_email = #{email} and ch.status = 1 and ch.vaccination_nm IS NOT NULL

SELECT ch.no, ch.cd_no, avg(ch.height) as height, avg(ch.weight) as weight, avg(ch.head) as head, ch.vaccination_nm, ch.inoculation_agency, ch.inoculation_order, ch.etc, DATE_FORMAT(ch.reg_date, "%Y-%m-%d") reg_date, ch.mod_date, ch.u_email, ch.status, c.name as cd_name FROM child_health ch JOIN child c ON ch.cd_no = c.no WHERE ch.u_email = #{email} and ch.status = 1 and ch.cd_no = #{childNo} GROUP BY reg_date ORDER BY reg_date LIMIT 20
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO child_health ( cd_no, u_email, height, weight, head, vaccination_nm, inoculation_order, inoculation_agency, etc, reg_date, mod_date ) VALUES ( #{cd_no}, #{u_email}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{head}, #{vaccination_nm}, #{inoculation_order}, #{inoculation_agency}, #{etc}, now(), now() )
